dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page
Class AbstractMultiPage

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.platform.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page.AbstractPage
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page.AbstractMultiPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
Direct Known Subclasses:
XFormMultiPage
public abstract class AbstractMultiPage
extends AbstractPage

Implement this class when you want to provide a wizard that has multiple pages (tabs or dialog pages). A AbstractMultiPage implementation is registered via the extension-point dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin.guidedconfigwizard. A multi page implementation itself is a factory for AbstractPages that form the tabs or wizard pages.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

AbstractMultiPage

public AbstractMultiPage()
Since:
2008.b
Method Detail

doGetFirstPage

public AbstractPage doGetFirstPage()
This method is called to query the first page of the wizard. The default implementation returns null.

Returns:
The first page or null if the wizard has no pages
Since:
2008.b

doGetNextPage

public AbstractPage doGetNextPage()
This method returns the next page in a multi-page GUI. This method is called by the wizard when the next button is pressed or to query the list of tabs in an editor. The default implementation returns null.

Returns:
The next page or null if there are no more pages
Since:
2008.b

doHasNextPage

public boolean doHasNextPage()
Query to find out if the wizard has additional pages after the currently shown. The default implementation returns false.

Returns:
true if there are additional pages
Since:
2008.b

doCreateControls

protected final void doCreateControls(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Creates the GUI of the wizard. Do not override this method. As this is a multi-page implementation the GUI is contributed by the subsequent pages returned by doGetFirstPage() and doGetNextPage().

Overrides:
doCreateControls in class AbstractPage
Parameters:
parent - The composite to place the GUI in
Since:
2008.b

hasPrevPage

public boolean hasPrevPage()
Return if there exists a previous page

Returns:
true if there exists a previous page, otherwise false
Since:
2008.b

setNextButtonEnable

public void setNextButtonEnable(boolean enable)
Changes the enablement of the Next button when opened as dialog. Updating the Gui-buttons is not directly done when calling this method. It is done
  • after opening the page
  • after each page change
  • and after validating

Overrides:
setNextButtonEnable in class AbstractPage
Parameters:
enable - true to enable the button
Since:
10

isNextButtonEnabled

public boolean isNextButtonEnabled()
Checks, if the Next button is enabled when opened as dialog. This only checks the status set by the user, it does not take into account if there actually is a next page.

Overrides:
isNextButtonEnabled in class AbstractPage
Returns:
true if the button is enabled, false if not
Since:
10

setPreviousButtonEnable

public void setPreviousButtonEnable(boolean enable)
Changes the enablement of the Previous button when opened as dialog. Updating the Gui-buttons is not directly done when calling this method. It is done
  • after opening the page
  • after each page change
  • and after validating

Overrides:
setPreviousButtonEnable in class AbstractPage
Parameters:
enable - true to enable the button
Since:
10

isPreviousButtonEnabled

public boolean isPreviousButtonEnabled()
Checks, if the Previous button is enabled when opened as dialog. This only checks the status set by the user, it does not take into account if there actually is a previous page.

Overrides:
isPreviousButtonEnabled in class AbstractPage
Returns:
true if the button is enabled, false if not (default is true).
Since:
10

resetPreviousNextButtonEnablement

@Deprecated
public void resetPreviousNextButtonEnablement()
Deprecated. 

For internal use only. Reset the enablement of the Previous and Next buttons default. The default setting is true for both buttons.

Overrides:
resetPreviousNextButtonEnablement in class AbstractPage
Since:
10
